message: Let's start with a simple offer, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. A fair deal considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable, I propose a 60/40 split.

Bob, let's be realistic. The value is decreasing rapidly with each round, hurting me more than you. I'm offering you $45 which is a better deal than it seems right now.  Don't let this opportunity slip away.
